entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then northeast 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
